resource.description: The API Schema for AWS Route53 Recovery Readiness Cells.

properties.name: CellName
properties.description: The name of the cell to create.

type.description: The name of the cell to create.

properties.name: Cells
properties.description: A list of cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) contained within this cell, for use in nested cells. For example, Availability Zones within specific Regions.

type.description: A list of cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) contained within this cell, for use in nested cells. For example, Availability Zones within specific Regions.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

type.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

attributes.description: The API Schema for AWS Route53 Recovery Readiness Cells.

properties.name: CellArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cell.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cell.

properties.name: ParentReadinessScopes
properties.description: The readiness scope for the cell, which can be a cell Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or a recovery group ARN. This is a list but currently can have only one element.

type.description: The readiness scope for the cell, which can be a cell Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or a recovery group ARN. This is a list but currently can have only one element.
